text:
I've confirmed how it feels to wear it,
so I'll go change now.
Are you going to take it off already?

Yes, because if I accidentally tear it
or get it dirty, it'll be a big problem.

We have to treat costumes with care,
because they make me shine.

Could you please take one picture for me to
commemorate the first time I wore this outfit...

Oh, just one? Shouldn't I take as many
as it takes until Natsuha is satisfied...?
